original_text: The two groups argued more and more strongly. The leader of the soldiers thought that the people there might hurt Paul badly. So he said to his soldiers, ‘Go down into the group and take Paul away from them. Take him back with you into our strong building.’
korean_text: 큰 분쟁이 생기니 천부장은 바울이 그들에게 찢겨질까 하여 군인을 명하여 내려가 무리 가운데서 빼앗아 가지고 영내로 들어가라 하니라

sentences.original_text: The two groups argued more and more strongly.
sentences.korean_translation: 두 그룹이 점점 더 격렬하게 다투었습니다.

sentences.original_text: The leader of the soldiers thought
that the people there might hurt Paul badly.
sentences.korean_translation: 거기 있는 사람들이 바울을 심하게 다칠지도 모른다고

sentences.original_text: So he said to his soldiers,
and take Paul away from them.
